availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p: I hereby certify that Hiram W. Colver is a member of the bar of the Supreme Court of this State in good standing and I hereby recommend him as competent to fill the office of Commissioner of Deeds for Wisconsin or any State.
A Justice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.

State of New York
City and County of New York } SS

I, Henry W. Genet clerk of the said City and County and Clerk of the Supreme Court of said State for said County do certify that I have compared the preceding with the original certificate of membership of Hiram. W. Colver remaining in my office and that the same is a correct transcript therefrom and of the whole of such original.
In witness whereof I have hereunto subscribed my name and affixed my official seal this 27th day of February 1864.
